name: ShootAR-Hand Tracking Shooter Game
description:
A handtracking based shooter game made for the Manomotion game jam.Made using manomotion SDK lite,AR foundation and Unity3D. There are 2 modes: Arcade and Practice mode. The Click gesture is used to fire arrows and the Release and Grab is used to trigger a power bar which is further used to launch rockets.

Github Link:https://github.com/vaibhav-suri/ShootAR-HandTrackingGame
